Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downscale to party level in addition to upscaling.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Additional level added onto party level to scale NPC to.

Settings.Name: HP
Settings.Tooltip: The base HP recieved each scaled level. Constitution Modifier is added onto this.

Settings.Name: AC
Settings.Tooltip: The base AC recieved each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Initiative
Settings.Tooltip: The Initiative recieved each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Physical
Settings.Tooltip: The Physical ability recieved each scaled level, based on its highest. ( Strength or Dexterity )

Settings.Name: Casting
Settings.Tooltip: The Casting ability recieved each scaled level, based on its spellcasting ability. ( Intelligence, Charisma, or Wisdom )

Settings.Tooltip: The Strength ability recieved each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Wisdom
Settings.Tooltip: The Wisdom ability recieved each scaled level.
